Post Staff Writer Friday, January 28, 2011 Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) will not run for president in 2012 but has left the door open to running for governor of the Hoosier State. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence said in a letter to supporters first reported Thursday by the Indianapolis Star.`` We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.'' In an unexpected announcement, Google CEO Eric Schmidt has announced that as of today he will be stepping down from the captain's chair and will be replaced by co-founder Larry Page . official blog, Eric Schmidt said When I joined Google in 2001 I never imagined-even in my wildest dreams-that we would get as far, as fast as we have today. Search has quite literally changed people's lives-increasing the collective sum of the world's knowledge and revolutionizing advertising in the process.
